eu.aspire_fp7.adss.ga

Class RouletteWheelSelection<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.aspire_fp7.adss.ga.SelectionFunction<T>
      • eu.aspire_fp7.adss.ga.RouletteWheelSelection<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The gene class.

    public class RouletteWheelSelection<T>
extends SelectionFunction<T>
    The roulette wheel selection method with replacement.
    The probability of a chromosome to be selected is proportional to its fitness.
    Author:
    Daniele Canavese
